Returns: the send status which is one of @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_OK_E@, @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_RETRY_ON_CARRIER_NETWORK_E@, and @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_ERROR_E@
getSendStatus().Description: Returns the send status of the just-sent MMS.

Returns: the SendConf PDU This value may be null.
getSendConfPdu().Description: Returns the SendConf PDU, which confirms that the message was sent.

Parameters: int: send status, one of @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_OK_E@, @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_RETRY_ON_CARRIER_NETWORK_E@, and @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_ERROR_E@

byte: a possibly {code null} SendConf PDU, which confirms that the message was sent. sendConfPdu is ignored if the result is not @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_OK_E@. This value may be null.
CarrierMessagingService.SendMmsResult(in.Description: Constructs a SendMmsResult with the MMS send result, and the SendConf PDU.

Parameters: int: send status, one of @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_OK_E@, @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_RETRY_ON_CARRIER_NETWORK_E@, and @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_ERROR_E@
byte: a possibly {code null} SendConf PDU, which confirms that the message was sent. sendConfPdu is ignored if the result is not @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_OK_E@.
CarrierMessagingService.SendMmsResult(in.Description: Constructs a SendMmsResult with the MMS send result, and the SendConf PDU.

ClassDesc: The result of sending an MMS.
